_header: An hare in his form is shuddering
_description: Terms of venery regarding denning of animals — varying numbers of lines with varying numbers of monorhyming short lines

PULTayB741.First Lines:
An hare yn hys fforme ys schulderyngor downe laynyngor downe
                    syttyngeAn hartt ys herborydeA knygȝt ys herborydeA buk ys
                    logyd…
PULTayB741.Last Lines:
…A pygge hectyd and sydydA lombe and kyde
                    schulderyde
PULTayB741.Attributed Title: Termys off wenery & off Carvynge (last folio, verso)
